# Setup

```{r packages}
#devtools::install_github("EcoDynIZW/d6projdata")

sapply(list("sf", "tidyverse", "terra", "here", "ggplot2", "patchwork", "d6projdata", "mapview", "cowplot"), 
       library, character.only = TRUE, logical.return = TRUE)
```

# Data

```{r data}
data <- st_read()

data_name <- d6projdata::proj_data_name(x = data)

if(!base::dir.exists(paths = here::here("data", data_name))){
    base::dir.create(path = here::here("data", data_name),
                     showWarnings = TRUE,
                     recursive = TRUE)}

names(data)
nrow(data)

head(data, 10)
min(data$timestamp, na.rm = TRUE)
max(data$timestamp, na.rm = TRUE)
```

# create proj data file

```{r}
proj_data <- d6projdata::build_data_files(data_name = data_name, data_sf = data)

proj_data <- readxl::read_xlsx(here::here("data", data_name, paste0("meta_data_", data_name, ".xlsx"))) %>% 
  mutate(data_from = as.character(min(as.Date(data_from, 
            origin = "1970-01-01"))),
         data_to = as.character(max(as.Date(data_to, 
            origin = "1970-01-01"))))
```

# move data

```{r}
d6projdata::fun_move_raw(data_name = data_name,
                         data_path = here(
    "data", "unsortiert"))
```

# save data

```{r}
st_write(data, here::here("data", data_name, paste0(data_name, ".")))
```

# render data

```{r}
d6projdata:::render_projdata(
  path = here::here("data",
                    data_name),
  data_name = data_name,
  data_sf = data_sf,
  data = data,
  proj_data = proj_data,
  id_col = ""
)
```
